inputs for 32/35 bit input systems
=====================================
1#
0 10000000010  10000000000000000000000
0 10000000001  00100000000000000000000

2#
0 11111111110 11111111111111111111111
0 11111111110 11111111111111111111111



3#
1 00000000001 00000000000000000000000
1 01111111110 10000000000000000000000



4# 
1 10000000000 01000000000000000000000
1 10000000000 00110000000000000000000



5# 
0 10000000010 10000000000000000000000
1 10000000001 00100000000000000000000


6#  
1 10000000010 10000000000000000000000
0 10000000001 00100000000000000000000



7# 
0 10000000000 00000000000000000000000
1 10000000000 00000000000000000000000


8# 

0 00000000000 00000000000000000000000 
0 10000000010 11000000000000000000000 


9# 
0 10000000001 10100000000000000000000 
1 10000000001 10000000000000000000000 


10#  
1 10000000001 10100000000000000000000 
0 10000000001 10000000000000000000000 



Rounding for 35 bit input systems
=====================================

Round Up:

0 10000000001 10000000000000000000000 
0 01111111111 11111111111111111111111


Round to Even with change:
0 10000000001 00000000000000000001000
0 10000000001 00000000000000000010000

Round to Even no change:

0 10000000001 00000000000000000001000
0 10000000001 00000000000000000000000



Rounding for 32 bit input systems (when right shift happens that rounds)
========================================================================

Round Up:

0 10000000001 10000000000000001111 
0 10000000100 00000000000000000000


Round to Even with change:

0 10000000001 10000000000000001100 
0 10000000100 00000000000000000000


Round to Even no change:

0 10000000001 10000000000000000100 
0 10000000100 00000000000000000000
